context_of_use: The urban mobility planner reviews emission and traffic levels from sensors to understand current and past conditions.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: To understand environmental and traffic conditions for better planning.
description: The urban mobility planner reviews emission and traffic levels from sensors to understand current and past conditions.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates a review of sensor data.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner is logged into the Urban Mobility Planning System.
Sensor data is available and up-to-date.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner has reviewed the emission and traffic levels from the sensors.
assumptions: The system has access to real-time and historical sensor data.
The urban mobility planner has the necessary permissions to access sensor data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to review emission levels at pollution sensors.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to review traffic levels at traffic sensors.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of sensors and data available for review.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → The system displays the available emission levels from pollution sensors.
2. urban mobility planner → The system displays the available traffic levels from traffic sensors.
